objects.name: ball_1
objects.info:
First bouncing ball with full physics simulation.

Equations use:
- Custom properties (Vx, Vy, Ax, Ay)
- prev values for frame-to-frame continuity
- if() conditionals for collision detection

This demonstrates advanced MoPiX features for realistic physics.

Vx.text: if(t == 0, 3, if(prev.x + prev.Vx <= 0, prev.Vx * -1, if(prev.x + prev.Vx >= 800, prev.Vx * -1, prev.Vx + Ax)))
Vx.description: Horizontal velocity with wall bounce detection

Vy.text: if(t == 0, 0, if(prev.y + prev.Vy <= 20, if(prev.Vy < 0, prev.Vy * -1, prev.Vy + Ay), prev.Vy + Ay))
Vy.description: Vertical velocity with ground bounce detection

x.description: Update X position using horizontal velocity

y.description: Update Y position using vertical velocity

Vx.text: if(t == 0, 3, if(prev.x + prev.Vx <= 0, prev.Vx * -1, if(prev.x + prev.Vx >= 800, prev.Vx * -1, prev.Vx + Ax)))
Vx.description: Horizontal velocity with wall bounce detection

Vy.text: if(t == 0, 0, if(prev.y + prev.Vy <= 20, if(prev.Vy < 0, prev.Vy * -1, prev.Vy + Ay), prev.Vy + Ay))
Vy.description: Vertical velocity with ground bounce detection

x.description: Update X position using horizontal velocity

y.description: Update Y position using vertical velocity

objects.name: Star with pen
objects.info:
Tracks the average position of both balls.

Equations:
x = (object_4.x + object_9.x) / 2
y = (object_4.y + object_9.y) / 2

Demonstrates MoPiX's powerful OBJECT REFERENCE feature - objects can reference other objects' properties! The pen trail feature visualizes the path.

x.description: Average X position of both balls

y.description: Average Y position of both balls

redColorPen.description: Repeatedly increases red for 47 ticks then decreases it for 47 ticks.

greenColorPen.description: Repeatedly increases green for 59 ticks then decreases it for 59 ticks.

blueColorPen.description: Repeatedly increases blue for 53 ticks then decreases it for 53 ticks.
